getting_started_text: To get setup and running you need to complete a quick {count} step process. Let’s start by connecting your Wallet.
create_account_text: Your wallet is connected! Now lets create a Reflexer Account so you can start to deposit, borrow and earn rewards.
create_safe_text: Your account was created. The final step is to create a Safe and deposit some ETH and borrow some RAI
uniswap_modal_check_text: I also want to liquidity mine the RAI/ETH Uniswap pool
confirm_details_text: Please review the details of your transaction. Once confirmed click then Confirm Transaction button to submit and sign the transaction on {wallet.type}
confirm_text: Please click “Confirm Transaction” to finalize your vote
wrong_network: Heads up! You’re on the wrong network please switch to
